job_tasks.phrase: deal with big data which needs to be validated, processed (apply calculations) and loaded into systems for further processing
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the activities involved in validating, processing (applying calculations), and loading data into systems, which are core components of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and maintain new ETL solutions and calculation engines.
job_tasks.justification: ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) solutions and calculation engines are fundamental components of data engineering pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement a new architecture to deliver data to the Credit Risk Datawarehouse applications.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing an architecture to deliver data to applications is a software development task that involves system design and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Improving stability, performance, and reliability of the Credit Risk applications.
job_tasks.justification: Improving stability, performance, and reliability are key aspects of software development and maintenance for applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Build scalable deployment pipelines, to support Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery.
job_tasks.justification: Building deployment pipelines for CI/CD is a core MLOps/DevOps activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Automate test and make it part of the design, code, build and release process.
job_tasks.justification: Automating tests and integrating them into the software development lifecycle (design, code, build, release) is a key MLOps practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Own your product and know how your product(s) are performing implementing the required Observability/Monitoring.
job_tasks.justification: Owning product performance and implementing observability/monitoring are crucial MLOps responsibilities for production systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Whatever software you develop, you own it and support it in the full lifecycle of your product.
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership and supporting software throughout its lifecycle is a fundamental software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: your software requires to be trustworthy and you are keen to be the best in class to learn and apply security standards.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring software is trustworthy and applying security standards falls under secure software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Help Credit Risk to make big steps to the future. Enhance the CI/CD maturity, move to a containerized environment, prepare for the move to the public cloud etc.
job_tasks.justification: Enhancing CI/CD maturity, containerization, and cloud migration are all key aspects of operations and infrastructure management within an MLOps context.

job_tasks.phrase: The Vortex teams operate according to the Scrum Agile development process. The focus is on high-quality secure-critical software delivered in time.
job_tasks.justification: Operating within Scrum Agile and focusing on high-quality, secure-critical software delivery are core software development process elements.

soft_skills.phrase: We expect you to share and teach your knowledge to other team members as well.
push us to the next architectural design of our credit risk program. This means thinking about, trying out and applying this new architecture.
Whatever software you develop, you own it and support it in the full lifecycle of your product.
Own your product and know how your product(s) are performing
In short, we expect you to have or help us have a vision on how to provide our services in the future.

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes data processing, ETL, building and maintaining calculation engines, and improving application performance, aligning with core ML Engineer responsibilities. While there's mention of architecture and CI/CD, the focus is on data handling and system improvement rather than generative AI model development or advanced prompt engineering.
